xwikidoc.content: rightsmanager.like=Like like.unlike.modal.title=Unlike confirmation like.unlike.modal.body=Are you sure you wish to remove your Like for page {0}? like.unlike.modal.closeButton=Close like.unlike.modal.unlikeButton=Unlike the page like.unlike.modal.viewLikersButton=Likes like.newlike.success=The page has been liked. like.newlike.error=Error when trying to like the page. like.unlike.success=The page has been unliked. like.unlike.error=Error when trying to unlike the page. like.userprofile.menu=Liked Pages like.toggle.hint.like=Like this page. like.toggle.hint.unlike=Unlike this page. You currently like this page. like.likers.link.zero={0} Likes like.likers.link.one={0} Like like.likers.link.many={0} Likes like.likers.link.title=Number of likes on this page: {0}. Click to see who liked this page. like.likers.empty=No one likes this page yet. like.likers.number={0} person(s) like this page: like.likers.title=Persons liking {0} like.livetable.column.title=Title like.livetable.column.location=Location like.livetable.column.likes=Likes like.configuration.heading=Like Preferences XWiki.Like.LikeConfigurationClass_alwaysDisplayButton=Always display Like button XWiki.Like.LikeConfigurationClass_alwaysDisplayButton.hint=Display the button even if the user doesn't have the rights to interact with it. Use it if you wish to always display the Likes counter. XWiki.Like.LikeConfigurationClass_cacheCapacity=Cache capacity XWiki.Like.LikeConfigurationClass_cacheCapacity.hint=Number of Like information kept in cache. Note that you have to restart XWiki for this option change to be taken into account. XWiki.Like.LikeConfigurationClass_enabled=Enable Like feature XWiki.Like.LikeConfigurationClass_enabled.hint=If unchecked this will disable the Like feature and hide information related to Likes.
